name: HyperDRIVE Blaster
description:
HyperDRIVE Blaster is a vertical shoot-em-up where you fight through waves of enemies in order to defeat the alien leader. You can enter HyperDRIVE to earn twice as many points for defeating enemies and also speed up your firing rate. 

Created for Nokia 3310 Jam 3.

Controls:

4/5/6/8 - Move left / back / right / up

7 - Shoot

9 - HyperDrive

1/2 - Select / Cancel

3 - Quit game

*NOTE*: It is strongly recommended to play the game using a keyboard number pad as this game was designed to be similar to a nokia 3310. The regular number keys on the top row will also work but it will be difficult.
